episodes.title: Watchtower Takes In Billions While Preaching Generosity (Jehovah's Witnesses Exposé)
episodes.description:
My faith-based channel:  @jonathanlegerpodcast  
The Broken Mirror (my Christian theology book): https://a.co/d/gQhwcso

JW Video:
https://www.jw.org/en/library/videos/#en/mediaitems/StudioTalks/pub-jwb-129_2_VIDEO

References:
Watchtower Property Sales & Finances
• JW Leaks - "Watchtower Properties" - Documentation of $2,081,520,000 in NY property sales (2004-2018)
o Source: https://jwleaks.org/watchtower-properties/
• Brooklyn Eagle (December 4, 2015) - "Sales of Watchtower headquarters and two other Jehovah's Witnesses' properties could total $1.2 billion"
o Source: https://brooklyneagle.com/articles/2015/12/04/
• Prosoco (June 3, 2021) - "Jehovah's Witnesses' Watchtower Sales Revitalize Brooklyn Neighborhood"
o Reports final Squibb building sale for $340 million in 2017
o Source: https://prosoco.com/jehovahs-witnesses-watchtower-sales-revitalize-brooklyn-neighborhood/

Kingdom Hall Ownership & Donations
• Watchtower Letter to Elders (March 29, 2014) - Mandatory monthly congregation donations directive
o Cited in: JW Survey article by Cedars (July 26, 2017)
o Source: https://jwsurvey.org/cedars-blog/governing-body-instructs-congregations-to-pledge-fixed-monthly-donations
• AvoidJW.org (November 26, 2023) - "Legally Establishing Watchtower Assets"
o Documents Menlo Park Congregation case and Kingdom Hall ownership structure
o Source: https://avoidjw.org/news/legally-establishing-watchtower-assets/

Faithful & Discreet Slave Doctrine
• The Watchtower (July 15, 2013) - Pages 21-22 
o Redefining the Faithful & Discreet Slave as only the Governing Body
Shunning/Disfellowshipping Policies
• The Watchtower (October 2017) - Page 16
o "Despite our pain of heart, we must avoid normal contact with a disfellowshipped family member"
• The Watchtower (September 15, 1981) - Page 25
o "A simple 'Hello' to someone can be the first step that develops into a conversation"
• JW.org - "How Do Jehovah's Witnesses Treat Those Who Used to Belong to Their Religion?"
o Current official stance on "removed" members (formerly disfellowshipped)
o Source: https://www.jw.org/en/jehovahs-witnesses/faq/shunning/

2024 Policy Changes
• Governing Body Update #2 (March 15, 2024)
o Announced changes to shunning practices and dress code
o Analyzed by AvoidJW.org
• The Watchtower Study Edition (August 2024)
o New terminology: "removed from the congregation" instead of "disfellowshipped"
o Allows "simple greeting" at meetings only
o Analysis by AvoidJW.org: https://avoidjw.org/news/the-watchtower-study-edition-august-2024-what-you-should-know/

Child Sexual Abuse - Australian Royal Commission
• Royal Commission into Institutional Responses to Child Sexual Abuse
o Case Study 29 (July-August 2015)
o Case Study 54 (2017)
o Finding: 1,006 alleged perpetrators, none reported to authorities
o Source: https://www.childabuseroyalcommission.gov.au/case-studies/case-study-29-jehovahs-witnesses
• Royal Commission Report (2016)
o "We do not consider the Jehovah's Witness organisation to be an organisation which responds adequately to child sexual abuse"

Norway Legal Case
• Oslo District Court Ruling (March 4, 2024)
o Upheld deregistration, JWs ordered to pay NOK 1.1 million in court costs
• Borgarting Court of Appeal (March 14, 2025)
o Overturned district court decision
o Awarded JWs 8,500,000 kroner ($806,833 USD) in legal costs
o Source: JW.org announcement
• Norwegian Government Appeal (April 24, 2025)
o Government filed appeal to Supreme Court
o Reported by AvoidJW.org: https://avoidjw.org/news/norway-appeal-childrens-rights-court-shunning/
• AvoidJW.org Analysis (January 25, 2025)
o "Watchtower's Desperation In Norway - Chasing State Grants"
o October 24, 2024 letter analysis
o Source: https://avoidjw.org/news/watchtowers-desperation-in-norway-chasing-state-grants/

Disaster Relief Insurance Claims
• JWFacts.com - "Donations - History behind Watchtower's increasing pressure" 
o Documents insurance claim practices during disaster relief
o Source: https://jwfacts.com/watchtower/donations-money-solicitation.php

Academic Studies on Shunning Impact
• PMC (PubMed Central) - "What Happens to Those Who Exit Jehovah's Witnesses: An Investigation of the Impact of Shunning" 
o "Results suggest shunning has a long-term, detrimental effect on mental health, job possibilities, and life satisfaction"
o Source: https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC9803876/

Personal Testimonies
• AvoidJW.org - "Disfellowshipping and Disassociation" (April 22, 2025) 
o Collection of personal testimonies from shunned individuals
o Source: https://avoidjw.org/disfellowshipping-disassociation/

Additional Resources
• JWFacts.com - Comprehensive documentation of Watchtower policies and doctrine changes
o Source: https://www.jwfacts.com/
• Wikipedia - "Jehovah's Witnesses" and "Jehovah's Witnesses congregational discipline"
o Current as of 2025 with recent policy updates

episodes.title: Misinformation & Conspiracy Theories: Questions For JWs #jworg #jehovahswitnesses #watchtower #exjw
episodes.description:
If you're one of Jehovah's Witnesses, I want you to know that I appreciate and agree with the article on JW.org, "Protect Yourself From Misinformation". However, I do have a few questions for you regarding what it says.
